title: Unknown Files
description: Identifies files with unrecognized extensions that are not standard Minecraft content types. Unknown files may indicate misplaced assets or incompatible content.

fields.title: Unknown File Type
fields.description: Error when a file with an unrecognized extension is found in the pack. Minecraft only supports specific file types (JSON, PNG, TGA, OGG, FSB, etc.). Remove or relocate unknown files.
fields.technicalDescription: Data contains the file extension or path of the unknown file
